Description_Enable_Global_Ruststone_MaxC: Enables a global cooldown after ruststone use. [Default: true]
Description_Global_Ruststone_MaxCooldown: If enabled, how long the player's global ruststone cooldown lasts for in seconds. [Default: 30, Min: 1]
Description_Ruststone_LesserStabilityCos: Temporal stability cost to use a lesser runestone in percent. [Default: 60, Min: 1]
Description_Ruststone_GreaterStabilityCo: Temporal stability cost to use a greater runestone in percent. [Default: 60, Min: 1]
Description_Ruststone_MastercraftStabili: Temporal stability cost to use a mastercraft runestone in percent. [Default: 60, Min: 1]
Description_Ruststone_Rift_TimeToLive: Estimated time a spawned rift stays for after 'ruststone use' in seconds. [Default: 300.0D, Min: 0.1D]
